content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":261952,"originalJapaneseLine":"今夜は寝るぞ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm going to sleep tonight..."},{"lineNumber":261953,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、お前今夜つきあうか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera, will you keep me company tonight..."},{"lineNumber":261954,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしてだ、そんな娼婦みたいなマネが出来るか","translatedEnglishLine":"Why? I can't do something like a prostitute."},{"lineNumber":261955,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふーん、じゃ・・別の誰かで、マリアだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, then... someone else, Maria."},{"lineNumber":261956,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ・・ちょっと待て、へんな事をしないのなら相談ならのってやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera... hold on a moment, if you don't do anything strange, I'll listen to your consultation."},{"lineNumber":261957,"originalJapaneseLine":"きたくないんじゃにないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't you not want to come home?"},{"lineNumber":261958,"originalJapaneseLine":"私の使徒だ、私が面倒みてやる必要がある","translatedEnglishLine":"She's my follower; I need to take care of her."},{"lineNumber":261959,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":261960,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド外","translatedEnglishLine":"Outside M-land"},{"lineNumber":261961,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが歩いていると、コパンドンか誰かが電報を渡してくれる","translatedEnglishLine":"As Rance walks, Copandon or someone hands him a telegram."},{"lineNumber":261962,"originalJapaneseLine":"読むと　リーザス城にいるリアからの私信","translatedEnglishLine":"Upon reading, it is a private message from Ria at Leesas Castle."},{"lineNumber":261963,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにをいってるんだ、こんな時にバカが、しかし・・・この電報？","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying, idiot at a time like this? But... this telegram?"},{"lineNumber":261964,"originalJapaneseLine":"日付は今日だし、時間は３０分前じゃないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"The date is today, and the time is thirty minutes ago, isn't it?"},{"lineNumber":261965,"originalJapaneseLine":"早うしとか使ってもこんなに早く届かないだろう、どうしているんだ？","translatedEnglishLine":"Even using a Coursar, it wouldn't arrive this quickly. How is this possible?"},{"lineNumber":261966,"originalJapaneseLine":"知らないんですか、コンピュータですよ。とシィルがえらそうに言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't you know? It's a computer. Shir speaks arrogantly."},{"lineNumber":261967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィルの説明、誰か補足してくれてもいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Shir's explanation, someone else might want to add to it."},{"lineNumber":261968,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　コンピューターというのを使うといろいろな情報が手に入ったり","translatedEnglishLine":"By using a computer, one can obtain various kinds of information,"},{"lineNumber":261969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　また一瞬で距離関係なく連絡が取れるんです","translatedEnglishLine":"and also contact anyone instantly regardless of distance."},{"lineNumber":261970,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ゼスや一部のマニアの方しか使ってなかったのですが、今回の世界規模の","translatedEnglishLine":"Only Xth and some enthusiasts had used it, but now, due to a world-scale"},{"lineNumber":261971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　戦いにおいて迅速な連絡が必要という事で、ランス城の総統司令部や","translatedEnglishLine":"battle requiring rapid communication, the General Headquarters at Rance Castle and"},{"lineNumber":261972,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　各国の司令部にコンピュータールームが置かれやりとりされているんです","translatedEnglishLine":"the command centers of various countries set up computer rooms to exchange information."},{"lineNumber":261973,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図：世界地図／情報ネットワーク","translatedEnglishLine":"Map: World Map / Information Network"},{"lineNumber":261974,"originalJapaneseLine":"なるほど、各国内の連絡はともかく世界中の情報が瞬時に分かるとは","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, aside from communication within countries, the fact that global information is instantly available is..."},{"lineNumber":261975,"originalJapaneseLine":"どういう事かと思っていたが・・そういう訳か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I was wondering what it meant... so that's the reason..."},{"lineNumber":261976,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういう事なら、この司令部にもあるんだな、よし見にいこう。","translatedEnglishLine":"If that's the case, this headquarters must have one too. Alright, let's go see."},{"lineNumber":261977,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":261978,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Free City Headquarters"},{"lineNumber":261979,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か混乱している様子・・","translatedEnglishLine":"There seems to be some kind of confusion..."},{"lineNumber":261980,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにヌヌハラが現れる、駄目です・・いろいろ試してみましたが","translatedEnglishLine":"Nunuhara appears there, saying, \"It's no good... we've tried various things,"},{"lineNumber":261981,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンピューターを通しての情報のやりとりが何者かに妨害されています。","translatedEnglishLine":"but information exchanges through the computer are being interfered with by someone.\""},{"lineNumber":261982,"originalJapaneseLine":"総統司令部と連絡が取れないばかりか、一般の情報の取得も・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Not only can we not contact the General Headquarters, but also cannot obtain general information..."},{"lineNumber":261983,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこでランスを見てあわあわ","translatedEnglishLine":"Then he looks at Rance, flustered."},{"lineNumber":261984,"originalJapaneseLine":"コンピュータールーム","translatedEnglishLine":"Computer Room"},{"lineNumber":261985,"originalJapaneseLine":"担当のヌヌハラに説明を聞こうとするが、性格の問題で無理","translatedEnglishLine":"Trying to get an explanation from Nunuhara in charge, but it's impossible due to his personality."},{"lineNumber":261986,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンあたりが説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon or someone explains."},{"lineNumber":261987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっきシィルちゃんがいっていた通り、このコンピューターを使って","translatedEnglishLine":"As Shir-chan mentioned earlier, using this computer,"},{"lineNumber":261988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統司令部と各国司令部が密接に連絡のやりとりしていたんたやけど","translatedEnglishLine":"the General Headquarters and each country's command center have been closely communicating,"},{"lineNumber":261989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あかんのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"but it's not working?"},{"lineNumber":261990,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんなの始めてです・・駄目です","translatedEnglishLine":"This has never happened before... it's no good."},{"lineNumber":261991,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、役にたたないなコンピューター、で、どうなるんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"What? The computer is useless then? So, what happens now?"},{"lineNumber":261992,"originalJapaneseLine":"各国間の情報のやりとりがほとんど出来なくなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Information exchange between countries will be almost impossible."},{"lineNumber":261993,"originalJapaneseLine":"早うしなどで行っても１．２日はかかる・・平時ならともかく今は","translatedEnglishLine":"Even going by Coursar would take a day or two... and it's not peacetime now."},{"lineNumber":261994,"originalJapaneseLine":"各地が魔軍の占領下なのでもっとかかる、または全然連絡が送れない事もある","translatedEnglishLine":"Since many areas are under demon army occupation, it would take longer, or contact might be impossible altogether."},{"lineNumber":261995,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに連絡だけでなくコンピューターだと瞬時やりとり出来るので直接合わなくても","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, it's not just communication; through the computer, exchanges are instant, so even without meeting directly,"},{"lineNumber":261996,"originalJapaneseLine":"相談や打ち合わせが出来ていたのにそれも出来ない・・","translatedEnglishLine":"consultations and meetings could be held, but now that isn't possible either..."},{"lineNumber":261997,"originalJapaneseLine":"せっかくランス総統の元、一致団結して戦っているのに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"We've managed to unite and fight under General Rance, but..."},{"lineNumber":261998,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむむ・・このコンピューターが壊れているんじゃないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... isn't the computer broken?"},{"lineNumber":261999,"originalJapaneseLine":"違います、別のでも試しました、ああ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, we've tried another one too... ah..."},{"lineNumber":262000,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう一度試してみます・・送信・・・・・・　エラー　駄目です","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll try again... sending... error. No good."},{"lineNumber":262001,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが文句を言う、都市長あたりがいいかな、分からず屋ぽく","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone complains, maybe the city mayor, acting stubborn and ignorant."},{"lineNumber":262002,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな理屈も分かっていない装置に人類の運命を託す方が間違っているうんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a mistake to entrust humanity's fate to a device that doesn't even understand such logic, blah blah."},{"lineNumber":262003,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルがコンピューターをしばし調べていたが顔をあげていう","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle studies the computer for a while, then raises her face and says,"},{"lineNumber":262004,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひとつうまくいかなかったからといって新しい物を否定するのは思考が硬直しすぎだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rejecting new things just because one attempt failed is too rigid thinking."},{"lineNumber":262005,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ・・なるとほ、魔法を使って動かすというのは道理だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... I see, it makes sense that it's operated using magic."},{"lineNumber":262006,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは超小型の異界ゲート発生装置だ、私以外に異界ゲートを理解する者がいるとは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"This is an ultra-compact otherworldly gate generator device. I didn't expect anyone besides me to understand the otherworldly gates..."},{"lineNumber":262007,"originalJapaneseLine":"なるほど、なるほど・・とうんうんとミラクル","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, I see... Miracle nods."},{"lineNumber":262008,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかるように説明しろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Explain it so that we can understand."},{"lineNumber":262009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このコンピューターという機械、それ自体は特殊な物だ","translatedEnglishLine":"This machine called a computer, in itself, is a special thing."},{"lineNumber":262010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　未知のテクノロジーで作られておりさっぱりわかんが","translatedEnglishLine":"It is made with unknown technology, so I don't understand it at all,"},{"lineNumber":262011,"originalJapaneseLine":"　が、情報伝達のやりとりなどをする際には、異界ゲートを開いて","translatedEnglishLine":"But when exchanging information, it opens otherworldly gates"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜は寝るぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to sleep tonight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、お前今夜つきあうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, will you keep me company tonight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてだ、そんな娼婦みたいなマネが出来るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why? I can't do something like a prostitute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん、じゃ・・別の誰かで、マリアだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, then... someone else, Maria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ・・ちょっと待て、へんな事をしないのなら相談ならのってやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera... hold on a moment, if you don't do anything strange, I'll listen to your consultation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きたくないんじゃにないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you not want to come home?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の使徒だ、私が面倒みてやる必要がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's my follower; I need to take care of her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド外
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outside M-land

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが歩いていると、コパンドンか誰かが電報を渡してくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Rance walks, Copandon or someone hands him a telegram.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 読むと　リーザス城にいるリアからの私信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon reading, it is a private message from Ria at Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをいってるんだ、こんな時にバカが、しかし・・・この電報？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying, idiot at a time like this? But... this telegram?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日付は今日だし、時間は３０分前じゃないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The date is today, and the time is thirty minutes ago, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早うしとか使ってもこんなに早く届かないだろう、どうしているんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even using a Coursar, it wouldn't arrive this quickly. How is this possible?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らないんですか、コンピュータですよ。とシィルがえらそうに言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you know? It's a computer. Shir speaks arrogantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの説明、誰か補足してくれてもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shir's explanation, someone else might want to add to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターというのを使うといろいろな情報が手に入ったり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By using a computer, one can obtain various kinds of information,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また一瞬で距離関係なく連絡が取れるんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also contact anyone instantly regardless of distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスや一部のマニアの方しか使ってなかったのですが、今回の世界規模の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Xth and some enthusiasts had used it, but now, due to a world-scale

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いにおいて迅速な連絡が必要という事で、ランス城の総統司令部や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: battle requiring rapid communication, the General Headquarters at Rance Castle and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の司令部にコンピュータールームが置かれやりとりされているんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the command centers of various countries set up computer rooms to exchange information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：世界地図／情報ネットワーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: World Map / Information Network

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、各国内の連絡はともかく世界中の情報が瞬時に分かるとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, aside from communication within countries, the fact that global information is instantly available is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事かと思っていたが・・そういう訳か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was wondering what it meant... so that's the reason...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう事なら、この司令部にもあるんだな、よし見にいこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that's the case, this headquarters must have one too. Alright, let's go see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か混乱している様子・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There seems to be some kind of confusion...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにヌヌハラが現れる、駄目です・・いろいろ試してみましたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nunuhara appears there, saying, "It's no good... we've tried various things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターを通しての情報のやりとりが何者かに妨害されています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but information exchanges through the computer are being interfered with by someone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部と連絡が取れないばかりか、一般の情報の取得も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not only can we not contact the General Headquarters, but also cannot obtain general information...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこでランスを見てあわあわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he looks at Rance, flustered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Computer Room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 担当のヌヌハラに説明を聞こうとするが、性格の問題で無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to get an explanation from Nunuhara in charge, but it's impossible due to his personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンあたりが説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon or someone explains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきシィルちゃんがいっていた通り、このコンピューターを使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Shir-chan mentioned earlier, using this computer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部と各国司令部が密接に連絡のやりとりしていたんたやけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the General Headquarters and each country's command center have been closely communicating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あかんのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it's not working?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなの始めてです・・駄目です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This has never happened before... it's no good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、役にたたないなコンピューター、で、どうなるんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? The computer is useless then? So, what happens now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国間の情報のやりとりがほとんど出来なくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information exchange between countries will be almost impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早うしなどで行っても１．２日はかかる・・平時ならともかく今は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even going by Coursar would take a day or two... and it's not peacetime now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地が魔軍の占領下なのでもっとかかる、または全然連絡が送れない事もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since many areas are under demon army occupation, it would take longer, or contact might be impossible altogether.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに連絡だけでなくコンピューターだと瞬時やりとり出来るので直接合わなくても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, it's not just communication; through the computer, exchanges are instant, so even without meeting directly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相談や打ち合わせが出来ていたのにそれも出来ない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: consultations and meetings could be held, but now that isn't possible either...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかくランス総統の元、一致団結して戦っているのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've managed to unite and fight under General Rance, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ・・このコンピューターが壊れているんじゃないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... isn't the computer broken?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違います、別のでも試しました、ああ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, we've tried another one too... ah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度試してみます・・送信・・・・・・　エラー　駄目です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll try again... sending... error. No good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが文句を言う、都市長あたりがいいかな、分からず屋ぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone complains, maybe the city mayor, acting stubborn and ignorant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな理屈も分かっていない装置に人類の運命を託す方が間違っているうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a mistake to entrust humanity's fate to a device that doesn't even understand such logic, blah blah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルがコンピューターをしばし調べていたが顔をあげていう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle studies the computer for a while, then raises her face and says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつうまくいかなかったからといって新しい物を否定するのは思考が硬直しすぎだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rejecting new things just because one attempt failed is too rigid thinking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・なるとほ、魔法を使って動かすというのは道理だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... I see, it makes sense that it's operated using magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは超小型の異界ゲート発生装置だ、私以外に異界ゲートを理解する者がいるとは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an ultra-compact otherworldly gate generator device. I didn't expect anyone besides me to understand the otherworldly gates...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、なるほど・・とうんうんとミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, I see... Miracle nods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかるように説明しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explain it so that we can understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このコンピューターという機械、それ自体は特殊な物だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This machine called a computer, in itself, is a special thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未知のテクノロジーで作られておりさっぱりわかんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is made with unknown technology, so I don't understand it at all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、情報伝達のやりとりなどをする際には、異界ゲートを開いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when exchanging information, it opens otherworldly gates

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜は寝るぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going to sleep tonight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、お前今夜つきあうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, will you keep me company tonight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてだ、そんな娼婦みたいなマネが出来るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why? I can't do something like a prostitute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん、じゃ・・別の誰かで、マリアだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, then... someone else, Maria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ・・ちょっと待て、へんな事をしないのなら相談ならのってやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera... hold on a moment, if you don't do anything strange, I'll listen to your consultation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きたくないんじゃにないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you not want to come home?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の使徒だ、私が面倒みてやる必要がある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's my follower; I need to take care of her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド外
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outside M-land

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが歩いていると、コパンドンか誰かが電報を渡してくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Rance walks, Copandon or someone hands him a telegram.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 読むと　リーザス城にいるリアからの私信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon reading, it is a private message from Ria at Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにをいってるんだ、こんな時にバカが、しかし・・・この電報？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying, idiot at a time like this? But... this telegram?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日付は今日だし、時間は３０分前じゃないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The date is today, and the time is thirty minutes ago, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早うしとか使ってもこんなに早く届かないだろう、どうしているんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even using a Coursar, it wouldn't arrive this quickly. How is this possible?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らないんですか、コンピュータですよ。とシィルがえらそうに言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't you know? It's a computer. Shir speaks arrogantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの説明、誰か補足してくれてもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shir's explanation, someone else might want to add to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターというのを使うといろいろな情報が手に入ったり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By using a computer, one can obtain various kinds of information,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また一瞬で距離関係なく連絡が取れるんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also contact anyone instantly regardless of distance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスや一部のマニアの方しか使ってなかったのですが、今回の世界規模の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Xth and some enthusiasts had used it, but now, due to a world-scale

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いにおいて迅速な連絡が必要という事で、ランス城の総統司令部や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: battle requiring rapid communication, the General Headquarters at Rance Castle and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の司令部にコンピュータールームが置かれやりとりされているんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the command centers of various countries set up computer rooms to exchange information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：世界地図／情報ネットワーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: World Map / Information Network

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、各国内の連絡はともかく世界中の情報が瞬時に分かるとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, aside from communication within countries, the fact that global information is instantly available is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どういう事かと思っていたが・・そういう訳か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was wondering what it meant... so that's the reason...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう事なら、この司令部にもあるんだな、よし見にいこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that's the case, this headquarters must have one too. Alright, let's go see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City Headquarters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か混乱している様子・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There seems to be some kind of confusion...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにヌヌハラが現れる、駄目です・・いろいろ試してみましたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nunuhara appears there, saying, "It's no good... we've tried various things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターを通しての情報のやりとりが何者かに妨害されています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but information exchanges through the computer are being interfered with by someone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部と連絡が取れないばかりか、一般の情報の取得も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not only can we not contact the General Headquarters, but also cannot obtain general information...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこでランスを見てあわあわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he looks at Rance, flustered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピュータールーム
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Computer Room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 担当のヌヌハラに説明を聞こうとするが、性格の問題で無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying to get an explanation from Nunuhara in charge, but it's impossible due to his personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンあたりが説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon or someone explains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきシィルちゃんがいっていた通り、このコンピューターを使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Shir-chan mentioned earlier, using this computer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部と各国司令部が密接に連絡のやりとりしていたんたやけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the General Headquarters and each country's command center have been closely communicating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あかんのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it's not working?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなの始めてです・・駄目です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This has never happened before... it's no good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、役にたたないなコンピューター、で、どうなるんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? The computer is useless then? So, what happens now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国間の情報のやりとりがほとんど出来なくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information exchange between countries will be almost impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早うしなどで行っても１．２日はかかる・・平時ならともかく今は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even going by Coursar would take a day or two... and it's not peacetime now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地が魔軍の占領下なのでもっとかかる、または全然連絡が送れない事もある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since many areas are under demon army occupation, it would take longer, or contact might be impossible altogether.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに連絡だけでなくコンピューターだと瞬時やりとり出来るので直接合わなくても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, it's not just communication; through the computer, exchanges are instant, so even without meeting directly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相談や打ち合わせが出来ていたのにそれも出来ない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: consultations and meetings could be held, but now that isn't possible either...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せっかくランス総統の元、一致団結して戦っているのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've managed to unite and fight under General Rance, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ・・このコンピューターが壊れているんじゃないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... isn't the computer broken?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違います、別のでも試しました、ああ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, we've tried another one too... ah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度試してみます・・送信・・・・・・　エラー　駄目です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll try again... sending... error. No good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが文句を言う、都市長あたりがいいかな、分からず屋ぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone complains, maybe the city mayor, acting stubborn and ignorant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな理屈も分かっていない装置に人類の運命を託す方が間違っているうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a mistake to entrust humanity's fate to a device that doesn't even understand such logic, blah blah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルがコンピューターをしばし調べていたが顔をあげていう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle studies the computer for a while, then raises her face and says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつうまくいかなかったからといって新しい物を否定するのは思考が硬直しすぎだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rejecting new things just because one attempt failed is too rigid thinking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・なるとほ、魔法を使って動かすというのは道理だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... I see, it makes sense that it's operated using magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは超小型の異界ゲート発生装置だ、私以外に異界ゲートを理解する者がいるとは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an ultra-compact otherworldly gate generator device. I didn't expect anyone besides me to understand the otherworldly gates...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、なるほど・・とうんうんとミラクル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, I see... Miracle nods.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかるように説明しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explain it so that we can understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このコンピューターという機械、それ自体は特殊な物だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This machine called a computer, in itself, is a special thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未知のテクノロジーで作られておりさっぱりわかんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is made with unknown technology, so I don't understand it at all,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、情報伝達のやりとりなどをする際には、異界ゲートを開いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when exchanging information, it opens otherworldly gates
